mapper.select:
select sum(a.per_total) as perTotal,sum(a.per_duty) as perDuty,sum(a.normal) as normal,sum(a.late) as late,sum(a.`leave`) as `leave` from tj_attendance as a inner join ht_xq_wy as xw on a.xq_code=xw.xq_code and xw.status=0 inner join ht_wy_info as wy on xw.wy_code=wy.wy_code inner join ht_xq_info xq on a.xq_code=xq.code inner join (select area_id from ht_area where parent_ids like concat('%',#{params.areaId},'%')) area on area.area_id=xq.sso_regionalcode where 1=1
and a.xq_code in (${params.xqCode})
and wy.wy_code in (${params.wyCode})
